articles.content: Bengaluru Metro Rail Corporation Ltd. (BMRCL) has extended metro train services on January 17, in view of India-Afghanistan T20 cricket tournament that is taking place in Bengaluru. India and Afghani… [+2655 chars]

articles.author: Ashim Sunam
articles.title: Final boarding call for Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma in third Afghanistan T20I - Times of India
articles.description: Cricket News: Get the latest updates on the final T20I match between India and Afghanistan. This match is crucial for Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma ahead of the T20 World Cup. Read more to find out the key players and their performances in the series.
